pipeline.forgetmenot.name: Forget-Me-Not Shaders
config.forgetmenot.desc.sun_brightness: Brightness of the sun. Affects the appearance of the sky as well as brightness of direct sunlight on the ground.
config.forgetmenot.desc.cumulus_detail: Number of noise octaves used for cumulus clouds, greatly affects performance.
config.forgetmenot.desc.cirrus_detail: Number of noise octaves used for cirrus clouds, greatly affects performance.
config.forgetmenot.desc.curl_noise: Wind-like noise effects on the clouds. Slightly affects performance.
config.forgetmenot.desc.clouds_contribut: Controls whether clouds affect lighting and reflections.
config.forgetmenot.desc.cloud_shadows: Whether to allow clouds in front of the sun to make sunlight darker.
config.forgetmenot.desc.emission: Brightness of emissive objects like glowstone. Doesn't affect the lighting itself.
config.forgetmenot.desc.blocklight_warmt: Controls how warm the block light color is.
config.forgetmenot.desc.blocklight_brigh: Controls how bright the block light is.
config.forgetmenot.desc.ambient_brightne: How much ambient lighting is added everywhere, regardless of dimension, blocklight, or skylight.
config.forgetmenot.desc.realistic_metals: If enabled, metal reflections tint the incoming light color. Doesn't affect performance, but may look ugly in some situations.
config.forgetmenot.desc.fullbright: Enables fullbright. Please do not enable this option in an unethical situation where it would give you an unfair advantage over other players.
config.forgetmenot.desc.rtao_strength: Strength of the RTAO: 1.0 for full strength, 0.0 for no strength.
config.forgetmenot.desc.rtao_rays: The number of rays to cast for RTAO. Huge impact on performance.
config.forgetmenot.desc.rtao_ray_steps: The number of steps to use for each RTAO ray. Big impact on performance.
config.forgetmenot.desc.realistic_water: If disabled, will use the default water texture for water waves. If enabled, will calculate smooth realistic waves.
config.forgetmenot.desc.water_dirt_amoun: The amount of dirt in water. Used for water fog thickness.
config.forgetmenot.desc.water_color_r: RED component in the water color.
config.forgetmenot.desc.water_color_g: GREEN component in the water color.
config.forgetmenot.desc.water_color_b: BLUE component in the water color.
config.forgetmenot.desc.enable_bloom: Allows bright colors to bleed into their surroundings.
config.forgetmenot.desc.motion_blur: Blurs the screen along the motion vector.
config.forgetmenot.desc.purkinje_amount: Amount for purkinje effect. Zero disables.
config.forgetmenot.desc.purkinje_lift: Applies a small lift to the grayscale color from the purkinje effect.
config.forgetmenot.desc.saturation: Amount of saturation in the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.contrast: Amount of contrast in the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.vibrance: Amount of vibrance in the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.lift_r: Amount of lift in this component of the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.lift_g: Amount of lift in this component of the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.lift_b: Amount of lift in this component of the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.gamma_r: Amount of gamma in this component of the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.gamma_g: Amount of gamma in this component of the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.gamma_b: Amount of gamma in this component of the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.gain_r: Amount of gain in this component of the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.gain_g: Amount of gain in this component of the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.gain_b: Amount of gain in this component of the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.nether_diffuse: Shades the underside of blocks in the nether orange to simulate light from the lava oceans.
config.forgetmenot.desc.end_mist_color_r: RED component in the end mist color.
config.forgetmenot.desc.end_mist_color_g: GREEN component in the end mist color.
config.forgetmenot.desc.end_mist_color_b: BLUE component in the end mist color.
config.forgetmenot.desc.taa: Blends multiple frames to smartly remove most aliasing from the image.
config.forgetmenot.desc.no_taa_jitter: If enabled, skips the jittering of the image every frame for TAA. Results in less flickering, but less effective antialiasing.
config.forgetmenot.desc.shadow_resolutio: The rendering resolution of the shadow map. Greatly affects performance and quality.
config.forgetmenot.desc.strict_shadow_bi: Uses slightly more expensive calculations to use as little shadow bias as possible to ensure highest quality.
config.forgetmenot.desc.seasons: Enables the season cycle, where foliage is tinted and leaves fall according to the world time.
config.forgetmenot.desc.transition_lengt: The length of the transition period between seasons.
config.forgetmenot.desc.starting_season: Controls the season that each world starts at.
config.forgetmenot.desc.varied_tree_colo: Allows trees to be colored differently from foliage according to seasons
config.forgetmenot.desc.falling_leaves: Allows leaf blocks to thin during autumn and winter to simulate leaves falling from trees.
config.forgetmenot.desc.internal_materia: Internal option used by material shaders to detect if Forget-me-not is active. Do not disable.
config.forgetmenot.desc.fancy_powder_sno: Uses voxel ray tracing to render a fancy effect for powder snow instead of the traditional fog.
